column3: After more investigation, I've concluded that fixing this for segwit is more complicated than the couple of patches here (I will document the issues more fully in #8279).  However, to fix this issue for 0.13.0, we can simply move the `IsStandard()` check to happen after the premature-witness check.  I will update this PR shortly.\n\nWe can separately consider the best way to fix these types of iss
Updated with a simple fix for 0.13.0.\n
Thanks for fixing this problem and adding a test, too\nutACK 46c9620\n
It is just a comment. Don't consider it a blocker of anything.\n
